title: Navigating independence while maintaining family belonging
description: Navigating independence while maintaining family belonging
content:
Scenario: Navigating independence while maintaining family belonging
    Given Kenji is establishing adult independence
    And he also wants to remain part of family unit
    When the family_elohim supports this transition
    Then it should help family recognize Kenji's emerging adult status
    And it should maintain his belonging while respecting his autonomy
    And it should facilitate his transition from dependent child to adult family member
    And family relationships should evolve without breaking
    And the system should support healthy independence development
    And Kenji should participate in family as autonomous adult
